https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uLjGWaK6riaa8jSuSmaE5FNFRtR.jpg A handmade stop-motion fairy tale for adults that tells the tale of the struggle between the aristocratic White Mice and the rustic Creatures Who Dwell Under the Oak over the doll of their heart's desire. Blood Tea and Red String
